title: Across from the OCEAN! Panoramic OCEAN views - 1bedroom, Heat included
map_address: 285 Lynn Shore Drive, Lynn MA near Ocean
posting_body: ['COMPLETELY RENOVATED Oceanfront living with an ocean view in the Diamond District!', "The Breakers DIRECTLY across from King's Beach!", 'Formerly an 18th Century Hotel!', '1919 Classical Revival elevator building w/three miles of beaches along Lynn/Nahant Beach Reservations.', 'Simplify your life and enjoy affordable living in this stylishly modern one-bedroom apartment.', 'This cheerfully bright and sunny apartment has hardwood floors, high ceilings, in door laundry.', 'Walkable to the Lynn Commuter Rail for a 20 minute train ride to Boston.', "Walkable to both Lynn and Swampscott downtowns w/popular restaurants, bakeries, brewery, bars, galleries, farmer's markets, world class public art, stunning architecture & more!", 'Hike nearby majestic Lynn Woods or bike on The Northern Strand Bike Trail from Lynn to Boston.', 'Easy access to Routes 1/1A/95/129.', 'Price includes heat/hot water.', 'Pet friendly.', 'CALL TO SCHEDULE AN APPOINTMENT 781-962 -7432', 'APARTMENT IS CURRENTLY UNDER CONSTRUCTION!', 'WILL BE COMPLETELY RENOVATED BY AUGUST 1ST', 'MOVE IN DATE!!!!']
